message: Let's split it 60-40. You get a smaller share, but I'll make it worth your while
I'll take a slightly larger share, but I think this is a fairer split.
Meet me in the middle, Bob. A 55-45 split is a fair compromise
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 55-45 is still a bit too skewed towards you. I'll meet you at 52.5-47.5 this time.
